b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:34): cdbe0e8aea85495cfcf22db2db988e7d: specifically, "can live with" and "weakest objections" are ways to get a race to the bottom in terms of technical excellence if non-implementors start objecting a lot

b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:38): cdbe0e8aea85495cfcf22db2db988e7d: that is, framing decisions in terms of technical merit instead of framing them in terms of least objection
